name: Heart and Axe
description: One adventure, two stories. Play as one or both to discover their endings..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 600 Series or Higher Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 600 Series or Higher Storage: 300 MB available space
